{"id":580322725,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1635748149,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/580322725/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxArea = 0;\n    int area;\n    void dfs(int i,int j,vector<vector<int>>& grid){\n        if(i < 0 || j<0 || i>=grid.size() || j>=grid[0].size() || grid[i][j] == 0)\n            return;\n        grid[i][j] = 0;\n        area++;\n        dfs(i+1,j,grid);\n        dfs(i,j+1,grid);\n        dfs(i-1,j,grid);\n        dfs(i,j-1,grid);\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int m = grid.size();\n        int n = grid[0].size();\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j] == 1){\n                    dfs(i,j,grid);\n                    maxArea = max(maxArea,area);\n                    area = 0;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return maxArea;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
